mapper.insert:
select schedule_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SC_NUM, MEM_ID, S_DATE, E_DATE, HDAY1_CID, HDAY2_CID, HDAY3_CID, HDAY4_CID, HDAY5_CID, TDAY1_CID, TDAY2_CID, TDAY3_CID, TDAY4_CID, TDAY5_CID,title) VALUES(#{scNum},#{memId},#{sDate},#{eDate}, #{hday1Cid}, #{hday2Cid}, #{hday3Cid}, #{hday4Cid}, #{hday5Cid}, #{tday1Cid}, #{tday2Cid}, #{tday3Cid}, #{tday4Cid}, #{tday5Cid},#{title})
